terms.title: Program Overview
terms.content: Our 6-month full-stack development program consists of two 3-month segments: Frontend Development, covering HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), React.js, Webpack, and Tailwind CSS, and Backend Development, covering Node.js, Express.js, SQL (PostgreSQL), MongoDB, RESTful APIs, JWT, OAuth, Docker, and cloud deployment. Delivered online via pre-recorded videos, live Zoom meetings, and code-based projects, access is granted for 6 months plus an additional 3 months for review and is non-transferable.

terms.title: Eligibility and Enrollment
terms.content: No prior coding experience is required for the Frontend program, while basic frontend knowledge is recommended but not mandatory for the Backend program. Participants must be 18 or older (or have parental consent) and possess a computer, stable internet, and Zoom software. Enrollment requires completing the registration form and submitting payment.

terms.title: Payment Terms
terms.content: Program fees are detailed on our website. Payment options include a one-time payment with a discount or a 6-month installment plan, processed securely via platforms like Stripe or PayPal. Failed payments may pause access, and persistent failure may lead to termination without refund for services rendered. Fees are in USD, and you are responsible for any currency conversion fees.

terms.title: Refund Policy
terms.content: A full refund is available within 14 days of enrollment if less than 10% of content is accessed, requested in writing to support@[yourdomain].com. After 14 days, refunds are at our discretion, pro-rated for unused services. One-time discounts and scholarships are non-refundable, as are completed Zoom sessions and downloaded materials.
